room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Asheville in Asheville
review: Reid was a great game master and I had such a good time. At first, I was a little scared but when we got into our room and the time started it was a blast! Will be going back.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Asheville in Asheville
review: It was so fun! I enjoyed it very much and will definitely be going back for more!! Thank you Scout for being an awesome game master!!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Asheville in Asheville
review: We did the kidnapping and it was great fun, we broke out!Will definitely do this again. Takes the whole team.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Asheville in Asheville
review: We went here tonight as a group of 5 and did the Kidnapped room. It was so much fun and such a great challenge! My girlfriend and I will definitely be coming back next time we are in Asheville.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Asheville in Asheville
review: We did the Kidnapping room as a family on our vacation and loved it! The room was challenging and kept us on our toes but we escaped with 8 minutes left. The staff was awesome! We'd love to do this again!
